function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relocation diffusion of disease via global mobility","Impact":"Rapid spread of disease across long distances","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions and quarantine measures","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking, contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices","People":"Global travelers, international migrants","Owner":"Government, immigration authorities"},{"Description":"Hierarchical diffusion within countries from globalized cities","Impact":"Rapid spread of disease within countries from single or multiple points of entry","Mitigation":"Enhance surveillance and monitoring in high-traffic urban areas, promote adherence to public health guidelines","Technologies":"Smart city technology, surveillance cameras, data analytics for hotspot detection","People":"Urban residents, commuters, local authorities","Owner":"City governments, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Interpersonal transmission as a significant factor in disease diffusion","Impact":"High risk of disease spread through close contact","Mitigation":"Promote social distancing, mask-wearing, and hand hygiene, implement remote work policies","Technologies":"Video conferencing, remote collaboration tools, occupancy monitoring systems","People":"General public, essential workers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Employers, public health authorities"}]}
